main event: A round luminous object was observed, appearing as an extra bright star and estimated to be the size of a baseball to a basketball.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 15 minutes., The object was stationary and appeared at dusk., It is probable that the sighted object was the planet Venus due to its positioning at the time., The observer used binoculars for the observation., The sighting was reported from Kansas City.
witness description: cable foreman for SW Bell Telephone Company
